Luka Jović: Ne ljutim se, razumem zašto Mitar igra pre mene, ali jesam bio povređen
“Za moj status u reprezentaciji morate da pitate selektora Tumbakovića“, kaže mladi Realov napadač

01 Nov 2019

Povod je bio prvenac u Realovom dresu, ali svima nama u Srbiji mnogo su zanimljivije izjave o nesuglasicama Luke Jovića sa selektorom Ljubišom Tumbakovićem. I dok selektor, pa i sportski direktor FSS Vladimir Matijašević kažu da je Jović zgrešio jer se nije javio Tumbakoviću kad je pre utakmice sa Luksemburgom napustio nacionalni tim, Realov golgeter u intervjuu za Sportski žurnal odgovara: jesam bio povređen.“Za moj status u reprezentaciji Srbije morate da pitate selektora Tumbakovića. A što se tiče mog odlaska iz reprezentacije oko koga se mnogo polemisalo, kazaću da je lekar našeg tima utvrdio povredu zbog koje sam išao privatno na terapije. Da se razumemo, ne mora svaka povreda da bude teška i da zahteva pauzu od mesec dana“, kaže Jović za Sportski žurnal.
Dodaje i da će se sigurno odazvati ako bude stigao novi poziv selektora, jer nije ljut ni na koga, iako u taboru reprezentacije jedva da igra.“Ne ljutim se ni na koga, Aleksandar Mitrović pruža odlične partije u Fulamu i uradio je mnogo više od mene za reprezentaciju, tako da razumem zašto ima prednost u odnosu na mene. I ja to zaista ne doživljavam kao nikakav problem“, kaže Jović za Žurnal.

Luka Jovic: I am not angry, I understand why Mitar plays before me, but I was hurt
"You have to ask the coach of Tumbakovic for my national team status," says the young Real striker

01 Nov 2019

The occasion was the debut in Real's jersey, but all of us in Serbia are much more interested in statements about Luka Jovic's disagreements with coach Ljubisa Tumbakovic. While the FSS coach and director Vladimir Matijašević say that Jović was wrong because he did not answer Tumbakovic when he left the national team before the game with Luxembourg, Real's goalkeeper said in an interview with the Sports Journal: I was injured. " Serbia you have to ask selector Tumbakovic. And as for my departure from the national team, which has been a lot of controversy, I will say that our team doctor found an injury that caused me to go to therapy privately. To be clear, not every injury has to be severe and require a one-month break, ”Jovic told the Sports Journal.
He adds that he will surely respond if a new call from the selectors arrives, because he is not angry with anyone, though he hardly plays in the national team. "I am not angry at anybody, Aleksandar Mitrovic provides great games in Fulham and has done a lot more than me for the national team, so I understand why it has an advantage over me. And I don't really see it as any problem, "Jovic told the Journal.
